T02D2653:306b-1: aak'o bhya s'a dha nam n'a ma /
T02D2653:306b-3: mi 'khrugs pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D2653:306b-4: bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2653:306b-6: de yi sgrub thabs bri bar bya //
T02D2653:306b-7: dal 'byor theg chen rigs chen dang //
T02D2653:306b-8: snying rje shes rab yon tan dang //
T02D2653:306b-9: byams dang snying rje ldan pa dang //
T02D2653:306b-10: dad cing bla ma la gus pas //
T02D2653:306b-11: skyabs su sor zhing sems bskyed pa //
T02D2653:306b-12: dam tshig sdom ldan dbang thob pas //
T02D2653:306b-13: las dang cho ga shes nas ni //
T02D2653:306b-14: dgon pa'i gnas dang grong gi mthar //
T02D2653:306b-15: las bya bde ba'i stan 'dug nas //
T02D2653:306b-16: khrus byas gtsang ma'i gos can gyis //
T02D2653:306b-17: rang lhar gsal ba'i thugs ka ru //
T02D2653:306b-18: padma zla ba'i steng du h'um //
T02D2653:306b-20: bla ma dang ni mi bskyod pa //
T02D2653:306b-21: spyan drangs mdun du bzhugs pa la //
T02D2653:306b-22: bdun po rnam par dag par bya //
T02D2653:307a-2: chos rnams thams cad dngos med par //
T02D2653:307a-3: sems kyis bsgom par byas nas ni //
T02D2653:307a-4: bhr'um dang bam las sna tshogs bsgom //
T02D2653:307a-5: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam //
T02D2653:307a-6: rang gi sa bon dbus bsams nas //
T02D2653:307a-7: dam tshig dag dang phyag rgya dag / bsam zhing de bzhin nyid du sbyar ;
T02D2653:307a-8: / rnal 'byor pas ni bsgrub par bya //
T02D2653:307a-9: lha yi rnal 'byor tshul du bsgyur //
T02D2653:307a-10: zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sngo //
T02D2653:307a-11: g-yon pa mnyam gzhag rdo rje dang //
T02D2653:307a-12: g-yas pa sa gnon tshul can no //
T02D2653:307a-13: rgyan dang ldan par rang nyid bsgom //
T02D2653:307a-14: thugs kar pad zla'i steng du ni //
T02D2653:307a-15: de steng rang gi sa bon dang//
T02D2653:307a-16: phyag mtshan phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab //
T02D2653:307a-17: rang nyid mi 'khrugs par bsgoms nas //
T02D2653:307a-18: sangs rgyas bzhi po phyogs dang bstun //
T02D2653:307a-19: rang rang phyag rgya ldan par bsgom //
T02D2653:307a-21: 'dab ma brgyad la lha mo brgyad //
T02D2653:307a-22: phyag mtshon brgyad las sku bskyed do //
T02D2653:307a-23: rtsa sngags brgyad po brjod pa las ;
T02D2653:307a-24: / dri za'i phyogs su padma can //
T02D2653:307a-25: sku mdog dkar mo dpal be'u bsnams //
T02D2653:307a-26: me yi phyogs su 'jigs byed ma //
T02D2653:307a-27: sku mdog dkar mo 'khor lo bsnams //
T02D2653:307a-28: gshin rje'i phyogs su rnam rgyal ma //
T02D2653:307a-29: sku mdog sngon po rgyal mtshan bsnams //
T02D2653:307a-30: bden bral phyogs su mdangs ldan ma //
T02D2653:307a-31: sku mdog sngon mo gdugs bsnams pa //
T02D2653:307a-32: k'u yi phyogs su 'od ldan ma //
T02D2653:307a-33: sku mdog dmar skya padma bsnams //
T02D2653:307a-34: rlung gi phyogs su dkar sham ma //
T02D2653:307a-35: sku mdog dmar skya bum pa bsnams //
T02D2653:307a-36: gnod sbyin phyogs su dri med ma //
T02D2653:307a-37: sku mdog ljang gu 'bud dung bsnams //
T02D2653:307a-38: dbang ldan phyogs su yid gzhungs ma ;
T02D2653:307a-39: / sku mdog ljang gu nya bsnams pa'o //
T02D2653:307a-40: sgo ma bzhi po 'dod lha ste //
T02D2653:307a-41: phyogs dang bstun zhing phyogs skyong dang //
T02D2653:307a-42: gzhal yas rim par bsgom par bya //
T02D2653:307a-43: de ltar dam tshig lha bskyed de //
T02D2653:307a-44: thugs ka'i rdo rje'i h'um las ni //
T02D2653:307a-46: mi 'khrugs mdun nam spyi bor bsam //
T02D2653:307a-47: rang lus mi 'khrugs bsgoms bstims la //
T02D2653:307a-48: ltag 'og rim pa ji bzhin du //
T02D2653:307a-49: lha yi go rims ji bzhin bar //
T02D2653:307a-50: sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ro //
T02D2653:307a-51: yang na rang nyid lhar bsgoms la //
T02D2653:307a-52: mi 'khrugs mdun du bsgom par bya //
T02D2653:307a-53: gzungs drang pa yi ting 'dzin ni //
T02D2653:307b-1: de nyid sum brtsegs rang rang gzhan //
T02D2653:307b-2: lha dang bum pa mchod rten gtor //
T02D2653:307b-3: bum pa mchod rten la sogs nang //
T02D2653:307b-4: rgya mtsho zla ba padma la //
T02D2653:307b-5: lha bskyed ye shes bstim par bya //
T02D2653:307b-6: dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis //
T02D2653:307b-7: bdag la rab tu dgongs par mdzod //
T02D2653:307b-9: aa bighn'am ta kri ta h'um phat /
T02D2653:307b-10: thal sbyar sor gnyis phyir bskyed de //
T02D2653:307b-11: ta th'a ga to ta bha b'a ya sv'a h'a dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02D2653:307b-12: de nyid gdan la bzhugs pa la //
T02D2653:307b-13: mchod bstod la sogs dbul bya ste //
T02D2653:307b-18: ba lim ta p'u ja kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02D2653:307b-19: chos nyid mnyam pa'i dang las ma g-yos kyang //
T02D2653:307b-20: thugs rjes rtag tu mya ngan mi 'da' zhing //
T02D2653:307b-21: phrin las rnam bzhis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa //
T02D2653:307b-22: bcom ldan mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2653:307b-23: gtor ma mgron du dmigs la bsngo //
T02D2653:307b-24: sgra dang sems dang gzhi la gzhol //
T02D2653:307b-25: yan lag bzhi dang dmigs pa gsum //
T02D2653:307b-26: rang don du ni bsnyen pa yin //
T02D2653:307b-27: grangs dang dus dang mtshan ma'o //
T02D2653:307b-28: dngos grub sgrub pa'i bzlas pa ni //
T02D2653:307b-29: ngag dang shib bu rdo rje'i bzlas //
T02D2653:307b-30: yid kyis bzlas pa byas pa bzhi //
T02D2653:307b-31: me dang sgra dang sgra mthar gsum //
T02D2653:307b-32: brjod pa med pa'i bsam gtan te //
T02D2653:307b-33: thun gsum dag tu bzlas pa bya //
T02D2653:307b-34: gtong ma mchod bstod gtor ma btang //
T02D2653:307b-35: ye shes gshegs dang dam tshig bsdu //
T02D2653:307b-36: de ltar thun gsum sbyor ba yis //
T02D2653:307b-37: bsnyen pa sngon du song ba dang //
T02D2653:307b-38: gang 'dod dngos grub bab pa'i phyir //
T02D2653:307b-39: de nas las la sbyar bar bya //
T02D2653:307b-40: bzlas brjod me la tshul khrims rlung gis sbar //
T02D2653:307b-41: brtson 'grus chen po'i me lces sdig sgrib sreg / padma'i drod la char chu yis //
T02D2653:307b-43: nyi ma me shel me 'byung bzhin //
T02D2653:307b-44: mi yi lus la dngos grub ster //
T02D2653:307b-45: mi gnas bsod nams ster bar byed //
T02D2653:307b-46: sgra yis thar pa ster bar byed //
T02D2653:307b-47: 'di ni yid bzhin nor bu rin chen ltar //
T02D2653:307b-48: spyi bo'i gtsug tu kun gyis bkur bar 'os //
T02D2653:307b-49: ngan song rnams las thar lam 'dis sgrub bo //
T02D2653:307b-50: rang gzhan mdun du bsgoms kyang dngos grub ster //
T02D2653:307b-51: mgon po mi 'khrugs pa yi ni //
T02D2653:307b-52: sgrub pa'i thabs mchog 'di bris pa'i //
T02D2653:307b-53: bdag gi dge ba'i las 'di yis //
T02D2653:307b-54: bdag dang 'gro ba thams cad ni //
T02D2653:308a-2: 'gro la phan phyir chos ston zhing //
T02D2653:308a-3: sems can sdug bsngal las grol shog / bcom ldan
T02D2653:308a-4: 'das mi 'khrugs pa'i sgrub thabs rgyas pa slob dpon
T02D2653:308a-5: d'i bam ka ra shr'i dzny'a nas mdzad pa rdzogs
T02D2653:308a-8: bod kyi lo ts'a ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
